memberdef.argsstring: (string map_file, Map< uint32_t > &map_in, unsigned long map_x, unsigned long map_y, unsigned long scalar)
memberdef.name: importToMapAndRound

briefdescription.para: Imports the provided given file to the provided matrix, given the x and y dimensions. The integer value in the final matrix is multiplied by the scalar to generate the final matrix. Note that this doubles the memory usage.

parameterdescription.para: the path to the map file to import
the matrix to change the values of
the x dimension of the matrix
the y dimension of the matrix
the scalar to multiply all values in the final matrix by (before rounding to integer)

simplesect.para: the maximum value from the imported matrix

briefdescription.para: Contains the Landscape object for easy referencing of the respective coarse and fine map within the same coordinate system.
